CustomField.description: Forces a unique record for Contact and Application. Set by: Workflow Rule: BAMUpdateContactAppUniqueKeyField on new record or update of con app or contact Apex Class: ContactUtility.updateConAppUniqueKey on merge (since workflow is not triggered on child records during a merge)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Forces a unique record for Contact and Application
CustomField.label: Unique Key
